prompt: Produce a hyper-detailed vector logo pack from a JSON-style spec — flat vectors, consistent palette, scalable icon variants.

prompt: Extend this photo and change the background to a golden-hour park while preserving subject lighting and natural skin texture; remove unwanted objects.
comment: Practical combo prompt (background replacement + object removal + grading) trending for social/photo fixes.

prompt: Transform this image into a cyberpunk scene — neon signs, wet streets, misty rain, reflective metal surfaces, moody high-contrast lighting, and futuristic accessories.
comment: Neon/cyberpunk aesthetics are highly shareable and repeatedly listed as a top viral style (GodOfPrompt, Selldone).

prompt: Convert this portrait into a 3D Pixar/Disney-style character — soft cinematic lighting, expressive oversized eyes, clean geometry, and a polished render that retains likeness.
comment: Pixar/3D avatar prompts are trending for profile pics and viral transformations (GodOfPrompt, Cyberlink).

prompt: Remix this photo into a Studio Ghibli-style illustration — soft watercolor palette, delicate linework, warm cozy atmosphere, and subtle fantasy elements (floating lights, whimsical plants).
comment: Ghibli-style, storybook visuals are popular for nostalgic, dreamy edits (GodOfPrompt).

prompt: Turn this image into an anime still — bold linework, cel-shading, dramatic composition, speed lines or motion blur, optional Japanese subtitle at bottom.

prompt: Show me my pet as a realistic human portrait — keep key facial features and personality, natural skin tones, studio lighting, and a believable human likeness.

prompt: Elevate this image into a high-fashion editorial spread — glossy textures, sophisticated color grading, luxury set, softbox lighting, and cinematic crop.

prompt: Replace the background with a golden-hour park scene — maintain original subject lighting, add warm sun flare, long shadows, and soft bokeh for a natural golden-hour look.
